recipe_name: Honey and sesame-roasted carrots with raita
author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. For the honey and sesame-roasted carrots, place the oil, honey and sesame seeds into a bowl and mix well. Place the carrots into the bowl and stir to coat. Place the carrots onto a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 15 minutes, or until lightly browned. For the raita, place the yoghurt and mint into a small bowl, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. To serve, place the honey and sesame-roasted carrots onto a plate with the bowl of raita alongside.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  50ml/2fl oz clear honey ,  2 tbsp sesame seeds,  5 carrots, blanched and drained,  5 tbsp Greek-style yoghurt,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint leaves,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
